Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 74th overall pick, by Houston in 1981...
Injured on 8/9/1985 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1986, off Mario Soto (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (N) on 8/30/1986...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1986, hitting .312 with 26 HR, 102 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1987, hitting .357 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 3/2/1988 (Going to HOU: 2B G. Jefferies. Going to CHC: 3B R. Craig, RF R. Bryant)...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 5/10/1989...
Injured on 9/3/1989 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 6/16/1991 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7-8 weeks...
